hero.title: Visual Landing Page Builder
hero.subtitle: Build stunning SaaS landing pages with our drag-and-drop visual builder. No coding required - just drag, drop, and customize. Powered by Next.js 14, React 18, and TypeScript.

features.title: Why Choose Our Visual Builder?
features.subtitle: The most powerful and intuitive visual landing page builder for modern SaaS applications

pageBuilder.title: Drag & Drop Builder
pageBuilder.description: Visual page builder with real-time preview and instant customization

componentLibrary.title: Rich Component Library
componentLibrary.description: Extensive collection of pre-built, customizable components

responsive.title: Responsive Design
responsive.description: Perfect display across all devices and screen sizes

i18n.title: Internationalization
i18n.description: Built-in multi-language support with automatic translation

performance.title: Performance Optimized
performance.description: Lightning-fast performance with modern optimization techniques

community.title: Active Community
community.description: Join our growing community of developers and designers

readyToUse.title: Ready to Use
readyToUse.description: No complex configuration needed, clone the project and start using immediately, quickly launch your product page

modernDesign.title: Modern Design
modernDesign.description: Adopts the latest design trends and best practices, ensuring your page looks professional and modern

fullyCustomizable.title: Fully Customizable
fullyCustomizable.description: All components support custom configuration, easily adapt to your brand and product needs

typeSafe.title: Type Safe
typeSafe.description: Built with TypeScript, providing complete type support and better development experience

performanceOptimized.title: Performance Optimized
performanceOptimized.description: Built on Next.js 14, enjoy the latest performance optimizations and development experience

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.subtitle: Just a few simple steps to start using our visual builder

step1.title: Choose Template
step1.description: Browse our three templates and choose the one that best fits your project needs

step2.title: Clone Project
step2.description: Clone the project locally, install dependencies, and start developing

step3.title: Start Building
step3.description: Use our visual builder to create your landing page with drag and drop

templates.title: Three Landing Page Templates
templates.subtitle: We have carefully prepared three different styles of Landing Page templates, each optimized for different use cases and development needs. Choose the template that best fits your project to quickly launch your product page.

basic.title: Basic Template
basic.description: Clean and elegant design, ready to use. Perfect for beginners and projects that need to go live quickly, includes all necessary basic components.

advanced.title: Advanced Template
advanced.description: Feature-rich professional template with animations and advanced interactions. Perfect for commercial projects and products that need professional appearance.

custom.title: Custom Template
custom.description: Fully customizable flexible template with raw access to all components. Perfect for developers with special needs and complex customization projects.

howToChoose.title: How to choose the right template?

basic.title: Choose Basic Template
basic.description: If you are a beginner or need to start a project quickly

advanced.title: Choose Advanced Template
advanced.description: If you need professional appearance and rich features

custom.title: Choose Custom Template
custom.description: If you need full control and custom development
